title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: URF on the weekend before my exams. {{item:3070}}
Same {{item:3070}}
cannot find one for all mode under game mode???? not live???
If you thought of actually reading... It will be live from 11 am to 3 am the next day.
Thank You! {{champion:74}}
DOOM BOTS DOOM BOTS DOOM BOTS DOOM BOTS
I know it sounds crazy, but what if you combine 2 game modes together like URF and OFA?
Would it be possible to get a list of perma-banned champs in these announcements, with the reason they're perma-banned?
"11am- 3am"... Why?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Because OCE.

\#RitoLogic

Please if you make One for All. Make it truly mean one for all. All 10 champs is the same. Most of the time its like watching porno , rape categories, one team choose lux/ezreal, with so much skill, the other team got ekko and win without doing anything lol.
Riot have done this in the form of OFA: Mirror, which we can *probably* expect to see the next time OFA makes an appearance.
Wait, so where is Doom Bots, and nemisis draft, and why is URF coming back already, and why are teemo and karthus perma banned?

Doom Bots will likely be added to the queue sooner or later (*probably* later, once things settle down a bit and Riot has a proper rotation going). Nemesis Draft was one of the worse received modes, so it *may* not be added (at least not anytime soon).

URF is coming back so soon because it is, by far, the communities favourite game mode and a lot of people are still salty that we didn't get it for April fools (I think Riot want to give us as much URF this year as we can expect in following years).

Karthus is perma-banned in OFA because of his ult while Teemo is (likely) perma-banned because of his ult (also) and *probably* his blind as well (his stealth *may* also have something to do with it).
11am start is so stupid. I really don't care if its a long queue, just let us bloody queue for it.
wheres the black market one? i forgot the name of it
Black Market Brawlers? {{champion:41}} {{champion:21}}
Confusingly, it's only available from 11am to 3am.
is it down?
Its still not available to play whats happening
Question before I get home tonight - does Tarics armor aura apply 5 times or would it be treated as a unique aura?

aren't all aura buffs/debuffs Unique? like locket and abyssal
i'm not 100% sure but i'd say it wouldn't stack
